1 \defgroup system-requirements System Requirements
2 
3 \details
4 
5 \section development-environments Supported Development Environments
6 
7 - GNU gcc 4.4.7 or higher
8 - Microsoft Visual Studio 2019
9 - Microsoft Visual Studio 2022
10 
11 \note We are using the [Red Hat Developer Toolset](https://developers.redhat.com/products/developertoolset/overview)
12 for builds with non-standard GCC versions on Red Hat.
13 Therefore, we recommend using DTS as a modern and easy-to-use way, which does not affect the system GCC version and tools.
14 
15 \section deployment-environments Deployment Environments
16 
17 - Linux (kernel 2.6)
18 - Microsoft Windows
